column4: What's a good minimal IRC client that will let me have transparent backgrounds?
irssi
doesn't that only show ports that are in use?
er
outgoing ports are only open if they are in use
there is no 'firewall'
you can connect to anything
There is on these machines :-P
well them you have added it
I didn't, someone else did. :-P
then talk to them
no, it can't
Is there an program that can?
you really don't understand what you are playing with
I don't?
you need to do more research on how connections work
in order to make a connection on a port externally there has to be something listening
Right.
that's *not* the way to do it
you really need to understand what you're doing
ping is icmp and doesn't use ports
and if you are testing a specific range, then yes
outgoing port filtering is mostly annoying and pointless
